currentProject.name: Amritpal Singh Sandhu
currentProject.description:
Animate your videos and add motion graphics with easy drag and drop actions.
ShortMotion makes it easy to animate text, pictures, or videos. Just add an action into the timeline and you are all set. No complicated timelines or keyframes. This isn’t just another video editor — it’s motion graphics made simple.
GOODBYE KEYFRAMES. HELLO ACTIONS.
Take actions: use the pre-set animations that can easily be added, removed, or extended in your timeline. There are dozens of actions to choose from: move, spin, slide, wipe, mask etc.
